alert.note: Alert for Trumbull (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 01 at 6:52PM EDT until June 01 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM EDT FOR EASTERN TRUMBULL COUNTY... At 652 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Kinsman to near Vienna Center, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Vienna Center, Girard, Vienna, Johnston, Orangeville, Yankee Lake, Brookfield Center and West Hill. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
